name: MacBook Air
description: The incredibly thin and light MacBook Air is now more powerful than ever. It features a brilliant Retina display, new Magic Keyboard, Touch ID, processors with up to twice the performance,1 faster graphics, and double the storage capacity. The sleek wedge-shaped design is created from 100 percent recycled aluminum, making it the greenest Mac ever.2 And with all-day battery life, our most popular Mac is your perfectly portable, do-it-all notebook.

reviews.name: Peter
reviews.comment: I am very satisfied with this notebook at all levels, it was an excellent investment.

reviews.name: Jhon
reviews.comment: When you spend $2,000 on a computer you expect it to “just work”, no? Especially a Mac which has all the accolades and bragging under its belt. In this case initial impressions are severely disappointing.

reviews.name: Sasha
reviews.comment: I have been using MacBook Pros for many years. This model combines the best features in the newest MacBook Pro at a good price.
